                                 float alphaFrom)
        This is the default animator.
        Parameters:
        animators - user defined list of animators
        view - itemView to animate
        alphaFrom - starting alpha value
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • slideInFromLeftAnimator

        public static void slideInFromLeftAnimator(@NonNull
                                           java.util.List<android.animation.Animator> animators,

                                           android.view.View view,
                                           androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView,
                                           float percent)
        Item will slide from Left to Right.
        Parameters:
        animators - user defined list of animators
        view - itemView to animate
        percent - any % multiplier (between 0 and 1) of the LayoutManager Width
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1
